content: X-S MX Drywall nails (collated) Ultimate-performance collated drywall nail for fastening to steel using powder-actuated tools ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Nails- - - ### FEATURES:Features Strips of 10 collated nails – for extremely high productivity and easier fastener loading Fasten material directly to steel without pre-drilling Powder-actuated solution for greater productivity Metal top-hat design facilitates easy loading and reduces the risk of through-penetration when fastening thin materials X-S 16 fastener hardness provides higher application limits on steel Applications Fastening drywall track or brick ties to steel Fastening metal sheet to steel ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Steel Minimum thickness of base material (steel): 1/8 in Corrosion protection: Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm Technical Data | Base materials | Steel | Minimum thickness of base material (steel) | 1/8 in | Corrosion protection | Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Material | Carbon steel | Fastener shank diameter | 0.14 in | Point type | Cut point | Approvals | ICC-ES | For use with (tools) | DX 351, DX 5, DX 6 | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 2305187 -
